data.text: @HAYLESBEN It’s a literary work, don’t worry

@lisa_scullion According to the group photo I received today, all parents just let their kid wear any fancy dress outfit they like. Which is a relief! If parents were actually dressing like book characters I’d have to figure out an outfit for the Wise Old man for Wednesday 😬 https://t.co/Ms6hl9Uguc
@HAYLESBEN WEEK!!!! I’m stressing about one day  😬
@HAYLESBEN The nighttime is the right time to fight crime 👍
@clareymarey Ah send me a photo of Gekko later in the week, Cora will love it! (We’re going for generic witch on Wednesday and maybe Mary Poppins or Jesse from toystory on Friday!)
@merylkenny @HAYLESBEN Ever since then I carry spare specs and a school tie in case a last minute 'Harry Potter' is called for.
@SobukweScozia @HAYLESBEN Finally making up for the ‘dress your kid up as something starting with the first letter of their name with one week’s notice’ incident of 2021
@merylkenny @HAYLESBEN I just checked the email. Yesssssssss!!!!!!
